name: Droptogif
body: # Drop to GIF Zero-click movie to GIF conversion. Select a folder to watch and every movie saved or moved into that folder will be converted to an animated GIF. ### Download for OSX 10.10+ ## Dragging Drag a movie onto the app. The animated GIF will be saved in the same folder as the movie. You can also drag the file onto the app's dock icon. ## Watch a folder Save a movie from any app into the watched folder and the app will convert it immediately ## Settings Tweak the frames per second setting to trade off between file size and quality ## Can I contribute? Yes! See issues marked Help wanted ## Thanks * Gifify * ffmpeg * ImageMagick
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
